events.name: Space Engineering Gateway: Space Robotics Competition II
events.summary: A space robotics competition for first-year engineering students to complete tasks using the NED2 robot. The winner will receive a $100 gift card.

events.name: Becoming Civil
events.summary: Learn about the Civil Engineering program, meet students and faculty, and enjoy pizza and drinks.

events.name: UNHack 2024: Collaborate, Innovate, and Tackle Real-World Challenges!
events.summary: A collaborative problem-solving experience where students tackle real-world challenges, fostering creativity, teamwork, and entrepreneurial thinking to develop innovative solutions for sustainability and social impact.

events.name: Google Cloud Credits for Startups
events.summary: The BEST Program and Google Cloud are offering $25K in cloud credits to help early-stage startups develop and scale.

events.name: ONWiE's Virtual Summit "Engineering Diversity: Evaluating Effective Outreach"
events.summary: An engaging afternoon of learning on how to effectively capture and communicate the impact of outreach initiatives.

events.name: Marc Garneau in Conversation
events.summary: Join Marc Garneau, Canada's first man in space, as he discusses his new memoir "A Most Extraordinary Ride: Space, Politics and the Pursuit of a Canadian Dream."
events.location: Indigo, Manulife Centre, 55 Bloor St. W. Toronto, Ontario

events.name: Lassonde Engineering Society Fall Semi-Annual General Meeting
events.summary: Get to know the Lassonde Engineering Society, provide feedback, see constitutional changes, custom merch, free food and more!

events.name: Research Study on Entrepreneurship Education
events.summary: Participate in a research study aimed at understanding the impact of entrepreneurship education on fostering an entrepreneurial mindset and intentions among students.

events.name: In the Field with Public Services and Procurement Canada for Students with Disabilities
events.summary: A career event for students with disabilities.

events.name: Women in Pharma - Insights from Sanofi Professionals
events.summary: A panel discussion with professionals from Sanofi.

events.name: Lassonde Run Club
events.summary: A running club for Lassonde students.

events.name: Drop-In Yoga
events.summary: A drop-in yoga session for Lassonde students.

events.name: Co-op Job Search Appointments
events.summary: Appointments for co-op job search assistance.

events.name: Interactive Skills Building Session: Water and Wastewater Club presented by Water Resources Society of York
events.summary: A skills building session for the Water and Wastewater Club.

events.name: Career Centre: Bergeron Front Desk In-person & Virtual Drop-ins
events.summary: Drop-in advising with Career Peer Educators.
